services.name: Quality Management
services.para: our company looks to Quality Management (QM) as a method by which management and employees can become involved in the continuous improvement of the production of goods and services. It is a combination of quality and management tools aimed at increasing business and reducing losses due to wasteful practices.ND focus mainly in four critical components for a successful Quality Management strategy projects, which are customer satisfaction, employees involvement, managerial leadership, and process improvement and control.

services.name: Project Management
services.para: We stand strong with our business partners in planning, organizing, motivating, and controlling resources, procedures and protocols to achieve specific goals, utilizing project management tools and application which suit our clients.

services.name: Performance and Innovation Management
services.para: We offer our clients best practices in pro- cess improvement that provide essential elements of effective processes which ultimately improve their performance.Our services are across a project, a division, or an entire organization. We help integrating traditionally separate organizational functions, set process improvement goals and priorities, provide guidance for quality processes, and provide a point of reference for appraising current processes. We boost organizational ability to create a culture that encourages creativity and innovation.

services.name: Human Capital Management
services.para: We at ND believe on the fact that to make money in business, you must invest money. The same principle applies to keeping quality employees on staff and motivating them to do their job well.

services.name: Organizational Change Management
services.para: Significant organizational change occurs, for example, when an organization changes its overall strategy for success, adds or removes a major section or practice, and/or wants to change the very nature by which it operates. It also occurs when an organization evolves through various life cycles, just like people must suc- cessfully evolve through life cycles. For organizations to develop, they often must undergo significant change at various points in their development.Typically there are strong resistances to change because people are afraid of the unknown and think things are already just fine and don't understand the need for change.

services.name: Strategy Articulation
services.para: The process of developing long-range plans to deal effectively with environmen- tal opportunities and threats in light of corporate strengths and weaknesses which composed of mission,vision,strategy,goals,ppi and action
